name: Intangible Equation
description: Reaction: When you would take damage, become Intangible until the start of your next turn. Negate all damage/effects; flicker 3m. Cannot attack or react while Intangible.

name: Reactive Counterflow
description: When an enemy triggers your trap, you may act during their turn, spending up to 50% of your current SP on actions. +10 Accuracy and +10 Crit% during this counter. Once/round.

name: Iron March
description: Reduce trap/zone damage by 50%. Auto-pass trap Restrain/Knockdown (Tier 1). If you end movement inside a trap zone, gain +10 DR until your next turn.

name: Shadowstep Instinct
description: When a trap or hazard would affect you, roll 1d100 ≤ Grace. On success, ignore all effects and move 2–3m. On crit success (≤25% of Grace), regain 5 SP and gain +10 Evasion until next turn.

name: Hunter's Clarity
description: Advantage vs Fear/Charm/Suggestion/Confusion. When exposed to an Illusion, roll 1d100 ≤ Instinct to immediately disbelieve. +10 Accuracy/Crit% vs active illusion casters.

name: Rational Anchor
description: Automatically detect magical illusions within 10m. +20 Mental Resistance. On disbelieve, collapse illusion for allies within 2m and mark the caster, granting +15 Accuracy and +10% Spell Efficiency vs them.

name: Mirage Veil
description: Create 1–3 illusory copies (+10 Evasion each; 33% chance attacks hit an illusion). Illusions pop when hit or when you make a damaging attack.

name: Grand Illusion
description: 10m reality-warping illusion for 2 rounds. Enemies contest vs Presence or suffer Blinded/Disoriented/Fear I (choose). You gain +15 DR and +10 Accuracy while active. Countered by Mental Fortitude.
